pkgmetadata.longdescription: Covariate-Based Covariance Functions for Nonstationary Spatial Modeling // Estimation, prediction, and simulation of nonstationary Gaussian process with modular covariate-based covariance functions. Sources of nonstationarity, such as spatial mean, variance, geometric anisotropy, smoothness, and nugget, can be considered based on spatial characteristics. An induced compact-supported nonstationary covariance function is provided, enabling fast and memory-efficient computations when handling densely sampled domains.
